titleStmt.title: The tragedye of Solyman and Perseda Wherein is laide open, loues constancy, fortunes inconstancy, and deaths triumphs.
Solimon and Perseda.
titleStmt.author: Kyd, Thomas, 1558-1594, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde for Edward White, and are to be solde at the little North doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The tragedie of Soliman and Perseda.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
